member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Globalization.CultureInfoCache.GetCultureInfo(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Globalization.CultureInfo})
member.summary: Gets a read-only cached for the specified name. Only names that exist in will be used.
member.param: The cultures supported by the application.
member.returns: A read-only cached or null if a match wasn't found in .
